title: Remove download.webp from BM ENTERPRISES frontend

requirements.summary: Remove any UI references to the uploaded image download.webp so it is no longer displayed anywhere.
acceptanceCriteria: No UI page renders or references "download.webp".
If "download.webp" was included in any images array (e.g., gallery grids), it is removed from that list.
There are no broken image links caused by the removal.

file_operations.description: Audit the galleryImages list and ensure any entry referencing "download.webp" is removed/replaced so the Gallery page never renders it.
Audit the ongoingProjectsImages array and any other image usage on this page to ensure "download.webp" is not referenced anywhere.
Audit hero and section imagery (including any inline background-image usage) to ensure "download.webp" is not referenced.
Audit the page hero/supporting image references and ensure "download.webp" is not referenced.
Audit the page image references and ensure "download.webp" is not referenced.
Audit the showcase image reference and ensure "download.webp" is not referenced.
Audit header logo/imagery references to ensure "download.webp" is not referenced.
Audit footer logo/imagery references to ensure "download.webp" is not referenced.

requirements.summary: Delete the static asset file download.webp from frontend public assets so it is not shipped with the build.
acceptanceCriteria: The built site does not include the "download.webp" asset file.
The site builds successfully with no missing-asset errors.

file_operations.description: Remove the static asset file "download.webp" from the frontend public assets after confirming REQ-35 removed all references.
